_sText:
This is an achievement map based for Counter-Strike:Source.

This map has been designed to cater:

   Hostages rescue

I have tested this map. And got a lot of achievements :)

Any questions please leave a comment or pm me and I will get back to you ASAP.

Happy cheating the achievement system :)

Holds: 1 TERRORISTS 1 COUNTER-TERRORISTS 100+ HOSTAGES. ( Trust me, there's enough for loads. )

Note: Sorry for my English, I am from Russia. :D
